title: My new manager complained about me going to the bathroom three times in an 8 hour shift
body:
Yep.

At least the other one said don't worry about it because I drink plenty of water but seriously this is fucking ridiculous, I shouldn't have to be harassed for going to the bathroom once every three hours for two minutes or even mentioned to drink less water. I think it is degrading and inhumane to restrict people from drinking water or going to the bathroom because they expect them to never use the facilities.

If this is going to become an ongoing problem, what do I do? I need to drink plenty of water, I already had a kidney stone last year, I don't want another one, I shouldn't even need to find an excuse to use the bathroom or drink water. Just because I use the bathroom doesn't mean I am not productive or working hard, it just means I have to piss.
